data.title: Cisco 8821 Wireless IP Phone Bundle (CP
data.meta_description: The Cisco 8821 Wireless IP Phone supports a wide range of features for enhanced voice communications, Quality of Service (QoS), and security. It is specifically designed for workers whose roles are in more rigorous, industrial settings. The Cisco 8821 is ideal for nurses and doctors in healthcare, operations and engineering staff in manufacturing, customer service representatives in retail, service staff such as maids in hospitality, and workers on rigs in the oil and chemical industries.
data.text:
The Cisco 8821 Wireless IP Phone supports a wide range of features for enhanced voice communications, Quality of Service (QoS), and security. It is specifically designed for workers whose roles are in more rigorous, industrial settings. The Cisco 8821 is ideal for nurses and doctors in healthcare, operations and engineering staff in manufacturing, customer service representatives in retail, service staff such as maids in hospitality, and workers on rigs in the oil and chemical industries.

Features

Display: 2.4-in. (6-cm) color display with 240 x 320 pixel resolution

Call Appearance: Six-line appearances

Rugged Durability: Ingress Protection standard (IP54) rated and is sealed for protection against dust, splash and water. MIL-STD-810G tested, with a dozen drops onto concrete from heights of up to 5 feet (1.5 m), to help ensure shock resistance and avoid breakage if dropped.

Fixed Feature Buttons: Volume, Green key (answer/send/redial), Red key (power/end call), Application, Mute, Speakerphone, Numeric keypad

Navigation Keys: Four-way navigation and select keys

Programmable Softkeys: Two soft-key buttons to access screen-based applications, features, and functions

Bluetooth: Supports Bluetooth 3.0 the user’s choice of third-party wireless headsets and adds freedom by untethering the user from the handset.

Wi-Fi: IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac radio for VoWLAN communications support

Speakerphone: Includes high-quality, 2-way speakerphone

Audio: Wideband audio enhances clarity with the handset, speaker, or headset

Headset Port: Includes 3.5mm headset jack. Also supports Bluetooth headsets.

LED Indicator: Ring, message waiting, Wi-Fi status, and charging LED’s

Battery: Delivers up to 11.5 hours of talk time

Network Security: Enhanced encryption support for SHA-1 and SHA-2 signatures, Media encryption using Secure Real-Time Protocol (SRTP), Automatic certificate renewal – SCEP support

System Compatibility

Cisco Unified Communications Manager: 9.1(2), 10.5(2), 11.0(1), and later

Cisco Unified Survivable Remote Site Telephony (SRST): 10.x, 11.x, and later

Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express: 10.x, 11.x, and later

Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution (HCS): 9.x, 10.x, 11.x, and later

Package Contents

8821 Wireless IP Phone

Battery

Power Adapter with USB Charging Cable

Download Links

Cisco 8821 User Guide

Cisco 8821 Datasheet

We offer a 1-year warranty on all New and Certified Refurbished products, giving our customers peace of mind and confidence in their purchase.
